messages.content:
### Q: Why do the toggle buttons on the Settings page flicker or become unresponsive after updating to SmartHome Hub 3.2?
**A:** This is a known UI rendering issue introduced in version 3.2. To resolve it, apply the hotfix package **hub-ui-fix-3.2.1** from the admin console. If you cannot apply the hotfix immediately, clear your browser cache and restart the Hub as a temporary workaround.
I will now add this new FAQ entry to the SmartHome Hub help site.
